title: Google OAuth Authentication Success
description: Verify that a user can authenticate successfully using Google OAuth login flow with email verification.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Click on Google OAuth login button
Check that Google OAuth prompts the user to select or enter an account
Complete Google login with valid Google account credentials
Verify that user is redirected back to Helfi and authenticated session is established
Check email verification status is confirmed

title: Magic Link Authentication Success
description: Verify user can request and use a Magic Link sent by email to authenticate successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input a registered email address in Magic Link field
Submit Magic Link request
Verify that an email containing the Magic Link is received
Click on Magic Link in the email
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to onboarding or dashboard

title: Onboarding Flow Completion
description: Validate that a new user can complete the multi-step onboarding flow including physical metrics and health goals without errors.

steps.description: Login as a new user
Proceed through onboarding steps: SignUp, Physical Metrics, Health Goals, Medications, Supplements, Review
At each step, verify required fields are validated
Submit all onboarding steps with valid data
Upon completion, verify user is redirected to dashboard

title: Dashboard Data Display and Interaction
description: Ensure the main dashboard correctly displays up-to-date health metrics and supports user interaction with quick action shortcuts.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the dashboard
Verify weight, sleep, mood, energy, symptoms, supplements metrics are accurately displayed
Interact with quick action buttons (e.g. add check-in, upload photo)
Confirm appropriate modals or pages open and actions are functional
Check data visualization charts render correctly with valid data

title: Health Tracking Daily Check-in Success
description: Test creating, updating, and retrieving daily health check-ins including weight, mood, sleep, symptoms, supplements, and medications.

steps.description: Login and navigate to health tracking page
Enter valid data for weight, mood, sleep, energy, symptoms, supplements, and medications
Submit the daily check-in
Verify that data is saved without errors and reflected in dashboard
Retrieve past check-in history
Confirm historical entries are accurate and complete

title: Food Photo Analysis Accuracy
description: Verify AI-powered food photo analysis correctly identifies ingredients and provides nutritional information with high accuracy for diverse food types.

steps.description: Navigate to food analysis page
Upload clear photo of a complex meal
Verify AI returns detected ingredients list with nutritional breakdown
Upload blurry or partial food photo
Check AI handles poor quality image gracefully and returns best-effort analysis or error message

title: AI-Generated Health Insights Relevance
description: Ensure AI generates personalized and relevant health insights and recommendations based on the user's logged data.

steps.description: Login and access the insights page
Verify AI-generated insights are displayed with clear explanations
Modify user health data (e.g. add new symptoms or supplement)
Request regeneration of insights
Confirm updated insights reflect new data and are personalized

title: Supplements and Medications Management
description: Test photo recognition of supplements, dosage and timing management, and interaction safety checking features.

steps.description: Navigate to supplements management page
Upload clear photo of supplement packaging
Verify AI identifies supplement name and dosage details correctly
Input timing and dosage for supplements and medications
Trigger interaction safety checks
Verify interaction warnings or confirmations are displayed appropriately

title: Lab Report and Medical Image Upload and AI Extraction
description: Validate users can upload PDF lab reports and medical images successfully and that AI extracts key biomarker data accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to lab reports upload page
Upload a sample lab report PDF
Verify AI extracts biomarker values correctly and displays them
Navigate to medical images upload page
Upload sample medical image files
Confirm AI analyzes images and outputs relevant health information

title: Conversational AI Assistant Chat and Voice
description: Test the responsiveness and accuracy of the health AI assistant through both chat and voice interfaces.

steps.description: Navigate to AI chat interface
Send health query in chat text
Verify AI responds with relevant and helpful answer
Use voice input to ask a health question
Confirm AI transcribes voice correctly and provides appropriate answer

title: Stripe Billing and Subscription Workflow
description: Validate subscription purchase, credit purchase, and billing updates work correctly with Stripe integration.

steps.description: Navigate to billing page
Initiate subscription purchase flow
Complete payment information and submit
Verify subscription status is updated and confirmation is shown
Purchase usage credits via credit purchase modal
Confirm credits are added to user account balance

title: Device Integration and Auto Data Sync
description: Ensure health devices like Fitbit can be authorized, synced automatically, and health data updates appear in the app.

steps.description: Navigate to devices integration page
Authorize Fitbit account via OAuth flow
Verify device status shows connected
Trigger data sync or wait for automatic sync interval
Confirm Fitbit data appears in user health metrics on dashboard

title: Push Notifications Delivery and Preference Respect
description: Verify that push notifications and reminders are delivered promptly and respect the user's notification preferences.

steps.description: Set notification preferences to enabled
Trigger event that should send a push notification
Verify push notification is received on user device
Disable some or all notification preferences
Trigger notification event again
Confirm no notification is received when preference is disabled

title: Data Privacy and Secure Authentication
description: Test user data is protected during authentication and all personal health data APIs are secured.

steps.description: Attempt to access user health data API without authentication
Verify access is denied
Authenticate via Google OAuth or Magic Link and access health data APIs
Confirm user data is returned only for authenticated user
Check that passwordless flows do not expose sensitive data in URLs
Verify tokens and sessions are securely handled

title: Error Handling: Invalid Magic Link
description: Ensure system handles invalid or expired Magic Link authentication attempts gracefully with user-friendly messages.

steps.description: Attempt login with an expired or tampered Magic Link
Verify error message informs user about invalid or expired link
Allow user to request a new Magic Link
Confirm new Magic Link request succeeds

title: Admin Panel User Management Access Control
description: Validate that only admin users can access the admin panel and perform user and ticket management operations.

steps.description: Login with non-admin user
Attempt to access admin panel URL
Verify access is denied or redirected
Login as admin user
Access admin panel
Confirm admin is able to view and manage users and tickets

title: Supplement Interaction Safety Edge Cases
description: Test supplement and medication interaction checks handle complex edge cases including multiple overlapping interactions.

steps.description: Add multiple supplements and medications with known interactions
Trigger interaction safety check
Verify that all relevant interactions and warnings are displayed to the user
Add unknown or new supplements
Confirm system handles unknown supplements gracefully, prompting for caution

title: Credit System Enforcement and Limits
description: Verify daily and monthly usage limits for AI features enforced correctly with credit deduction and reporting.

steps.description: Use AI-powered features consuming credits repeatedly
Verify credits are deducted accurately on each usage
Attempt to use AI features after exhausting daily/monthly credit limits
Confirm system prevents further usage and notifies user of exhaustion
Purchase additional credits and verify balance updates
Confirm user can resume AI feature usage

title: Symptom Logging and AI Pattern Analysis
description: Verify symptoms can be logged with descriptions and photos, and AI analyzes patterns and trends effectively.

steps.description: Navigate to symptoms logging page
Enter symptom description and upload related photo
Submit symptom log
Verify symptom is recorded and visible in history
Access symptom AI analysis feature
Confirm AI provides pattern detection or trend insights based on symptom data

title: Waitlist Signup Functionality
description: Validate the waitlist signup API and UI allow users to register for early access smoothly.

steps.description: Navigate to waitlist signup page or form
Enter valid email and submit
Verify confirmation message is shown
Attempt duplicate signup with same email
Confirm duplicate entries are rejected or notified
